text: Tapa'inle hernuhunecha ki juna manisaharuko hrdayama (kapata) arthata roga cha, tiniharule uniharuko mamjhama daudi daudi janchan ra bhandachan ki hamila'i khatara cha yasto nahos ki hamimathi kunai apatti a'ide'os. Dherai sambhava cha ki allahale chittai vijaya pradana garos va aphubata kunai nirnaya de'os. Ani tyasapachi yiniharule aphna hrdayama luka'era rakheka kurama lajjita huna thalne chan
